#include <iostream>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	long long t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t>0)
	{
	    string s1,s2;
	    cin>>s1>>s2;
	    sort(s1.begin(),s1.end());
	    sort(s2.begin(),s2.end());
	    if(s1==s2)
	    {
	        cout<<"YES";
	    }
	    else
	        cout<<"NO";
	    cout<<endl;
	    t--;
	}
	return 0;
}
